<editorialDecl>
<correction>
It was found that the original text corpus required to be edited for the computational purposes.
We had performed the following corrections/modifications.
a) A single word has been split into two words
    -- Eg: RP+PRP constructions - Example: piranthavanY -> pirantha + avanY; Word + enYdru
b) Concatenation of two words into one 
    -- Eg: Reduplication words - Example:thattu thadumaari
</correction>
</editorialDecl>
</teiHeader>
